summary: REQ-7 and REQ-8 appear implemented by wrapping the app with the existing Web3Provider and introducing an ErrorBoundary that renders a friendly English error UI with a reload action. No immutable-path files are shown as edited in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Error fallback includes an optional “Show technical details” section exposing the React component stack trace.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-8 asked for a friendly English error message and a clear recovery action (reload). It did not request exposing technical details/component stack to end users.
